reason: NO_RULE - insufficient evidence or no valid constraint found
notes: The evidence provided only describes the behavior of the 'reportSlotConfig' field within a single IE context and does not establish any inter-IE relationship between the two fields from different IEs.

meta.evidence:
For a periodic or semi-persistent CSI report on PUCCH, the periodicity \( T_{C S I} \) (measured in slots) and the slot offset \( T_{\text {offset }} \) are configured by the higher layer parameter reportSlotConfig. Unless specified otherwise, the UE shall transmit the CSI report in frames with SFN \( n_{f} \) and slot number within the frame \( n_{s, f}^{\mu} \) satisfying
---
For a semi-persistent CSI report on PUSCH, the periodicity \( T_{C S I} \) (measured in slots) is configured by the higher layer parameter reportSlotConfig. Unless specified otherwise, the UE shall transmit the CSI report in frames with SFN \( n_{f} \) and slot number within the frame \( n_{s, f}^{\mu} \) satisfying
---
reportSlotConfig \\ Periodicity and slot offset (see TS 38.214 [19], clause 5.2.1.4). If the field reportSlotConfig-v1530 is present, the UE shall ignore the value provided in reportSlotConfig (without suffix).

full_api_response.notes: The evidence provided only describes the behavior of the 'reportSlotConfig' field within a single IE context and does not establish any inter-IE relationship between the two fields from different IEs.
